title: TIPOGRAFÍA MONTEVIDEO (Typography in Montevideo)
content:
Hola

Hace un par de meses ya que esta abierta la página de tipografía en Montevideo:

[http://www.tipografia-montevideo.info/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203175653/http:/www.tipografia-montevideo.info/ "http://www.tipografia-montevideo.info/")

Espero les guste

saludos

Ferch

\* Hi

I leave you the web page of Montevideo Typography (from Uruguay), it’s been open for a cupple of weeks now,

I hope you’ll like it

[http://www.tipografia-montevideo.info/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203175653/http:/www.tipografia-montevideo.info/ "http://www.tipografia-montevideo.info/")

Greetings

Ferch  
.

 [‹ Quark and InDesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203175653/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38941 "Go to previous forum topic") [Exceptional printer? Submit your best printers; environmental / green printers, letterpress, offset, digital printing, etc. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203175653/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37376 "Go to next forum topic")
author: strass

comments.content:
¡Gracias por el link, Ferch!

Thanks for the link, Ferch!

De nada! hay actualizaciones 1 vez por mes... por fin salimos a la luz tipográfica XD

Your welcome! we actualize oce per month... we can finally show ourselves to the typocraphic world XD
